description:
With the athleticism of a trail runner and the stability of a hiking shoe, the Rogue Hiker GTX provide you the comfort and traction to tackle the trails. The waterproof construction and gusseted tongue keep water and debris out, so you can explore the mountains rain or shine.

  • Ballistic mesh upper with TPU overlays for durability
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out while letting sweat escape
  • Webbing and laces are 100% recycled material
  • Bellows tongue keeps out water and debris
  • Locking midfoot lacing hardware for a precise fit
  • FloatPro™ Foam midsole provides plenty of cushion and underfoot protection
  • Cleansport NXT™ treated for natural odour control
  • Recycled mesh lining wicks sweat away from your foot
  • Running inspired rock plate with S-Curve geometry for better stiffness and stability
  • Integrated snowshoe strap catch and d-ring gaiter attachment
  • Vibram® MegaGrip® rubber outsole with 5mm lugs for flexible, grippy and durable performance
name: Merrell Rogue Hiker Mid Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
